content: Question: is the donation function on the Harris/Walz campaign website working properly? I tried to donate weekly, but it's just showing up as a one-time donation on Act Blue. I would've just changed my existing monthly donation to weekly, but for some reason Act Blue wouldn't let me do that.

Hi <@461385958689079303> this is the first time I've heard of a problem with ActBlue. Unfortunately our team here doesn't have any connection to ActBlue. I suggest reaching out to https://support.actblue.com
